dict.string:
# If TM_LATEX_MASTER not set use TM_FILEPATH [ -z "$TM_LATEX_MASTER" ] && export TM_LATEX_MASTER="$TM_FILEPATH"
# Switch to the right directory. cd "$TM_PROJECT_DIRECTORY" cd "`dirname "$TM_LATEX_MASTER"`" FILE=`basename -s.tex "$TM_LATEX_MASTER"`
rm -f "$FILE".aux rm -f "$FILE".pdfsync rm -f "$FILE".mtc* rm -f "$FILE".log rm -f "$FILE".bbl rm -f "$FILE".aux rm -f "$FILE".toc rm -f "$FILE".bmt rm -f "$FILE".out rm -f "$FILE".nav rm -f "$FILE".snm rm -f "$FILE".vrb rm -f "$FILE".blg rm -f "$FILE".aux.bak rm -f ~/Sites/web_kit_workaround.pdf
echo "Done Cleaning up"
